name: ROBORUSH (VIGVA)
description:
This is my first 3d game made with unity in just 3 weeks.

* * * CONTROLS * * *

W,A,S,D to walk

W,A,S,D + SHIFT to run

SPACE to jump

MOUSE to Look around

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to aim

R to reload

ESC to pause the game

MOUSE WHEEL OR 1,2,3 to change a weapon
